title: Earthquake — Immediate Actions
summary: If shaking occurs, protect yourself and seek safe shelter when it is safe to move.
steps: Drop, Cover, and Hold On — get under sturdy furniture until shaking stops.
If outdoors, move to an open area away from buildings and power lines.
When safe, evacuate to open ground or listed shelter and call for help if injured.
sms_template: Earthquake at {location}. Evacuate to nearest shelter. Are you safe? Reply YES/NO.
